mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, LIST.* FROM( SELECT RPE_NO, R.USER_NO, USER_ID, RPE_TITLE, RPE_CONTENT, RPE_IMG, RPE_CATEGORY, RPE_TIME, RPE_QUAN, RPE_DIFF, RPE_LIKE,TO_CHAR(RPE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')REGDATE, RPE_DATE, RPE_HIT FROM RECIPE R, USERINFO U WHERE R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO ORDER BY ${dbsort} DESC) LIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
